thread.title: 21 Gun Salute International Vintage Car Rally & Concours Show 2016 Brochure Unveiled at the Pebble Beach, California, USA
thread.title_full: 21 Gun Salute International Vintage Car Rally & Concours Show 2016 Brochure Unveiled at the Pebble Beach, California, USA

author: 21 Gun Salute Vintage Car Rally
title: 21 Gun Salute International Vintage Car Rally & Concours Show 2016 Brochure Unveiled at the Pebble Beach, California, USA
text:
New Delhi, Delhi, India India’s most premium Vintage car event, the sixth 21 Gun Salute International Vintage Car Rally & Concours Show 2016 is gearing up for its global journey. In the last 5 editions, the show has already made a mark amongst the vintage car aficionados across the globe. The international brochure of the show was unveiled on the sidelines of pebble beach - world’s biggest vintage car show held in California, USA.
Global celebrities from Sports, Hollywood and Corporate world who participated in the Pebble beach event, in person conveyed their best wishes to Mr. Madan Mohan and signed the first brochure of 6th edition of the rally. Hollywood star and Governor California Arnold Schwarzenegger, gymnast Nadia Comaneci, Corporate Tycoon Ratan Tata, applauded the efforts of Mr. Madan Mohan for single handedly organizing the vintage car rally in India on such enormity.
The 6 th edition of 21Gun Salute International Vintage Car Rally will be held on the 6 th & 7 th February 2016, with an aim to establish India as a world-class motoring tourism destination, by spreading awareness and interest among the people of the country and the rest of the world. The event incorporates, a full day of colorful cultural fest, a special parade of luxury-vintage cars and vintage/classic car race on the hi-tech F-1 track along with a magnificent display of rich cultural heritage of India.
About 21 Gun salute Vintage car rally:
An annual fiesta that brings together, a group of leading vintage car collectors and owners from different parts of the country and from abroad. This group consists of the elite part of our society, who exhibit and drive their motorized beauties of the by-gone era, amidst the modern-day fast moving technology driven cars. This event is an opportunity to look into the royal past, the evolution of motoring and to experience the automobile technology of early 19th century.The mission of this event is to acquaint the younger generation of car connoisseurs and aficionados, through a vintage car rally and concoursshow of international standards that introduces the rich heritage of cars in India and brings out the idea of seeing these gorgeous machines as a symbol of pride, luxury, beauty and rare technical excellence.
